name: Minimal AI
long_description:
Minimal AI makes it easy for e-commerce brands to build AI support teams that resolve 80% of tickets at human-level quality.

The result: reduced support costs while actually improving customer experience through personalized recommendations and faster response times.

It feels like outsourcing your support to a team of AI Agents, with the AI Manager as your single point of contact.

Over 45 e-commerce brands use Minimal AI to handle thousands of customer support tickets daily.
one_liner: AI Customer Support Teams for E-commerce
